name: @-ft/mode-react
description: React wrapper for theme mode manager

scripts.build: rimraf compile dist && tsc -p tsconfig.compile.json && rollup -c && dts-bundle-generator --no-banner -o dist/index.d.ts compile/index.d.ts
scripts.publish: npm run build && package-json-minifier && cpy README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish

author: Juyeong Maing <mjy9088@naver.com>
